pros: Has glide skill to quickly move through map
cons: Early game is a bit awkward until you gain passives that reduce DF consumption

baseStats: Excludes attack specfic bonuses, Hyper Skill passives,  and buffs with long cooldowns
Crit Rate: [ +20%] [ +15% to stunned, blinded, frozen, incapacitated]
Final Damage: [ +25%] [ +15% to stunned, blinded, frozen, incapacitated]
Boss Damage: [ up to +20%]
Ignore DEF: [ +30%] [ +15% from debuff]
EXP & Item Drop Rate (From Monsters): [ +20% from debuff]

buffInfo.summons: (120 - 105s cd),(120s cd), (150s cd)
buffInfo.buffCd: (32 - 90s cd), (214 - 200s cd), (120s cd), (120s cd), (120s cd)
buffInfo.buffFifth: (180s cd), (120s cd), (240s cd)
buffInfo.iFrame: (30s cd), (32 - 90s cd), (240s cd)

info: To create one choose the 'The Demon' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until Lv. 10 where you will be given the choice to choose between the 'Demon Avenger' or 'Demon Slayer' classes. You can also choose to skip the cutscenes at the beginning to go straight into choosing between the two classes

build: -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Demon Lash - Fury
  • Dark Metamorphosis - Enhance
  • Demon Impact - Reinforce and Extra Strike

extraContent.title: Demon Fury
extraContent.content: Demon Slayers do not use MP and instead use Demon Fury (DF) for their skills. DF will slowly regenerate on its own and whenever you hit an enemy with Demon Lash. Your max DF will increase every time you Job Advance (excluding 5th Job)

primary.name: Dark Winds
primary.shortDesc: High Jump: Press the up arrow key twice during a jump\nJag Jump: Press the right or left arrow key twice during a jump\nGlide: Jump Key (Maintain Press)
details:
Right-click the skill to toggle gliding
  • When on, you can perform a double jump but pressing the Jump Key twice instead

primary.name: Demonic Blood
primary.shortDesc: Willpower: Lv. 20, Ambition: Lv. 20, Knockback Resistance: +100%

primary.name: Curse of Fury
primary.shortDesc: 1% chance to increase damage by 100% when attacking. Recovers 5% HP when triggered. Absorbs Fury if target is eliminated.

primary.name: Demon Lash
primary.shortDesc: 1st, 2nd: Damage: 110%, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 2.\n3rd: Damage: 100%, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3\n4th: Damage: 100%, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 4
details: When the attack hits, you gain some DF

primary.name: Grim Scythe
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 15, Fury Cost: 2, When skill key is held - Damage: 100%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: While held, releases a spinning scythe in front of you

primary.name: Battle Pact
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 80, Attack Speed increased for 180 sec

primary.name: Shadow Swiftness
primary.shortDesc: Movement Speed +25, Jump +20

primary.name: HP Boost
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +30%

primary.name: Barbed Lash
primary.shortDesc: Demon Lash Damage: +80%p
details: Increases %p Damage of attack

primary.name: Soul Eater
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 45, Fury Cost: 3, When skill key is pressed down - Damage: 120%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 5
primary.desc: While held, creates a vortex that pulls enemies in

primary.name: Dark Thrust
primary.shortDesc: Fury Cost: 6, Damage: 115%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Dashes forward while pulling enemies along with you

primary.name: Chaos Lock
primary.shortDesc: Fury Cost: 20, After teleporting - Damage: 305%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Stun Chance: 90%, Stun Duration: 3 sec\nAfter teleporting, cannot absorb Fury for 0.7 sec\nCooldown: 0.7 sec
primary.desc: Teleports to a nearby enemy and damages them
details: Attack has a chance to stun

Chaos Lock can also be used as a teleport by pressing the Skill Key along with a Directional Arrow Key
  • Can be used in the air

primary.name: Vengeance
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 150, Returns 400% of damage received back to the enemy for 180 sec, Paralysis Chance: 90%, Paralysis Duration: 5 sec
primary.desc: While active, reflect back damage taken
details: Attack has a chance to stun

primary.name: Weapon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: One-Handed Blunt and Axe Mastery: +50%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Outrage
primary.shortDesc: ATT: +50, Critical Rate: +20%

primary.name: Demon Lash Arch
primary.shortDesc: Demon Lash Damage: +30%
details: Increases %p Damage of attack

primary.name: Judgment
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 300, Fury Cost: 20, Max Monsters Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 5, Damage: 200%, Critical Hit Rate: +40%
primary.desc: Leap into the air and dive down to launch thorns from the ground
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate

primary.name: Vortex of Doom
primary.shortDesc: Fury Cost: 10, Damage: 190%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Monsters Hit: 10, Stun Chance: 90%, Stun Duration: 5 sec
primary.desc: Creates a vortex on both sides that pulls in enemies
details: Attack has a chance to stun

primary.name: Raven Storm
primary.shortDesc: Fury Cost: 10, Damage: 170%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 5, Recovers up to 50% of HP, Invincible while casting\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Sends out a flock of ravens forward
details: When the attack hits an enemy, you restore some %Max HP
You are invincible while casting

primary.name: Carrion Breath
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 80, Fury Cost: 6. When skill key is pressed - Damage: 155%, Max Monsters Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 5. Poison Damage Over Time: 135% damage every 1 sec for 8 sec.
primary.desc: When held, releases a poison breath upon enemies
details: Enemies hit also receive a damaging poison debuff

primary.name: Black-Hearted Strength
primary.shortDesc: Increases Defense by +100%, Abnormal Status Resistance by +60, and Elemental Resistance by +60%.

primary.name: Insult to Injury
primary.shortDesc: When attacking enemies in Stun, Blind, Freeze, Slow, or Incapacitation status, Final Damage: +15%, Critical Rate: +15%

primary.name: Focused Fury
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +25%, Increases Attack Speed
details: Increases Attack Speed (by 1 stage)

primary.name: Possessed Aegis
primary.shortDesc: When attacking, 30% chance of guarding. When guarding is successful, 3% of HP and 5 Fury are recovered.
primary.desc: Grants a chance to guard an incoming attack
details: When guarding is successful, you restore some %Max HP and DF

primary.name: Max Fury
primary.shortDesc: When using Demon Slash, grants a 75% chance of absorbing additional Fury. Automatically recovers 10 Fury every 4 seconds.
primary.desc: Gain an increased chance to restore additional DF while using
details: Additionally, you now passively restore DF periodically

primary.name: Demon Thrash
primary.shortDesc: Demon Lash Damage: +30%, Final Damage: +30%
details: Increases %p Damage and %Final Damage of attack

primary.name: Infernal Concussion
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 300, Fury Cost: 15, Damage: 400%, Max Monsters Hit: 10. Deals 5 critical attacks that deal 320% damage.
primary.desc: Launches enemies into the air and deals an explosive attack
details: Explosion attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit

primary.name: Demon Impact
primary.shortDesc: Fury Cost: 8, Damage: 460%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 6, Additional Critical Rate: 100%, Enemy DEF Ignored: 30%, Slow Duration: 3 sec, Boss Damage: +40%
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF, %Boss Damage, and is a guaranteed Critical Hit while also slowing enemies hit

primary.name: Demon Cry
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 400, Fury Cost: 30, Number of Attacks: 7, Damage: 515%, Max Monsters Hit: 15. Duration: 20 sec, Enemy ATT and DEF: -15%, Accuracy -20%, EXP and Item Drop Rate: +20%.\nCooldown: 14 sec, reduced for 7 sec while Boundless Rage is in use
primary.desc: Launches into the air and creates a large shockwave that damages and debuffs enemies
details: [Debuff]: Enemy has decreased %Attack, %DEF, and %Accuracy. Enemy will grant increased %EXP and Item Drop Rate while defeated
Cooldown is reduced when Boundless Rage is active

primary.name: Binding Darkness
primary.shortDesc:
Fury Cost: 60, Damage: 700%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 3, 100% chance to Stun enemies for 10 sec
Stun Duration increased by up to 100% based on damage inflicted by Binding Darkness.
Cooldown: 120 sec
[Passive Effects] - Permanently increased Ignore Enemy DEF permanently by 30%
primary.desc: Launches a giant attack that binds enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Dark Metamorphosis
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 300, Fury Cost: 40, invincible while casting, Damage: +35% over 180 sec. Automatically attacks nearby enemies dealing 250% damage.\nCooldown: 90 sec\n[Passive Effect: Max HP: +20%]
primary.desc: Creates damaging orbs around your character and increases %Damage
details: [Passive]: Increases %Max HP
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Boundless Rage
primary.shortDesc: Fury Cost: 100, Use skills without consuming Fury, Duration: 50 sec\nCooldown: 200 sec

primary.name: Leech Aura
primary.shortDesc: Fury Cost: 30, For 180 sec, heals your party members for 3% of the damage you inflict. Cannot recover more than 25% of Max HP. Requires 5 sec cooldown.

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 500, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: The Demon's Will
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Barricade Mastery
primary.shortDesc: One-Handed Blunt and Axe Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +50, Critical Damage: +15%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Obsidian Skin
primary.shortDesc: Permanently decreases damage taken by 20%

hyperPassive.name: Demon Lash - Reinforce Duration
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Final damage of other skills after using Demon Lash: +10%, Duration: 4 sec

hyperPassive.name: Dark Metamorphosis - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: When activated, all of Demon Slayer's attacks will negate Attack Ignore and Attack Reflect effects for 20% of the duration time.\n[Passive Effect: Damage over time will negate Attack Ignore and Attack Reflect effects.]

hyperActive.name: Blue Blood
hyperActive.shortDesc: HP Cost: 300, Fury Cost: 30, Final damage of all attacks: +90% for 60 sec.\nCooldown: 120 sec, Cooldown: -3 sec every time 50 Fury is absorbed, Additional Cooldown: -2 sec every 4 sec when using Blue Blood and Boundless Rage at the same time.\n[Passive Effect - Fury consumption on all skills: -20%]
hyperActive.desc: Increases the number of hits per attack of all your skills
details: [Passive]: Permanently reduces DF consumption on all Skills
Does not apply to summoning skills or 5th Job Common Skills
Cooldown is reduced whenever you gain 50 DF and cooldown is also periodically reduced when is active

hyperActive.name: Cerberus Chomp
hyperActive.shortDesc: HP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 450%, Number of Attacks: 6, Boss Damage: +50%, Monster Defense Rate Ignored: 50%. Additional Fury Absorption: 50.\nCooldown: 5 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Unleashes a large chomp attack in front of you
details: Attack has increased %Boss Damage and %Ignore DEF
Grants DF when used

hyperActive.name: Demonic Fortitude
hyperActive.shortDesc: Fury Cost: 10, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Demon, Resistance, and Xenon party members.

fifthMain.name: Demon Awakening
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Fury Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Critical Rate: +62%
Automatically triggers Cerberus every 8 sec when you use an offensive skill, enhances Demon Lash and allows you to use Chaos Lock while Demon Lash is active
Enhanced Demon Lash - hits up to 6 enemies 3 times, Monster DEF Ignored: +50%, Boss Damage: +50%, 1st/2nd Hit Damage: 600%, 3rd Hit Damage: 700%, 4th Hit Damage: 800%
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, enhances and gain increased %Crit Rate
details:
While active, you can also activate while using and will periodically activate whenever you use an attack
  • Unaffected by Damage Reflect
Enhanced has increased %Ignore DEF and %Boss Damage

fifthMain.name: Spirit of Rage
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Consumes 80 Fury and 10% of Max HP
Duration: 15 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1700%, Number of Attacks: 12
[On Disappearance] Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1800%, Number of Attacks: 15
All hits receive Critical Rate: +100% and additional Ignore Def: +50%
Cooldown: 108 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a Spirit of Rage that attacks nearby enemies
details: Deals a final attack once the summon expires
Attack has increased %Ignore DEF and guaranteed Critical Hits
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Orthrus
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Consumes 60 Fury
Summon Duration: 40 sec
Nemea: Attacks every 2 sec, Damage: 800%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Max Hits: 12
Geryon: Attacks every 3 sec, Damage: 1800%, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Hits: 10
All Orthrus hits receive Additional Critical Rate: +100% and Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +50%
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons two spirits that attack alongside you
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF and guaranteed Critical Hits
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Demon Bane
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Fury Cost: 60, HP Cost: 2000
Attacks up to 5 enemies with 650% damage 6 times during key-down. Max Key-Down Time: 4 sec
When you stop holding the key, become invincible for 1.5 sec to consecutively attack 12 enemies with 1300% damage 7 time(s), increases attack time by 2x in proportion to key-down duration.
Additional Critical Rate: +50%, Additional DEF Ignored: +30% for all attacks
Cooldown: 240 sec
fifthMain.desc: Releases a storm of blades that strike from below
details:
When you release the Skill Key, you become invincible briefly and release a devastating final attack
  • Invincibility duration is increased based on how long the skill was held
  • Attack has increased %Ignore DEF and %Crit Rate
To cancel the invincible attack early, press the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together

meta: Demon Slayer is a STR warrior class part of the Demons & Resistance class group. Demon Slayers do not use MP and instead use Demon Fury (DF) for their skills. You will gain more DF every time you Job Advance (excluding 5th Job)
